titles.title: Data from the BAFACALO project: The Brazilian Intelligence Battery based on two state-of-the-art models: Carroll's model and the CHC model.

descriptions.description: The BAFACALO's dataset presents answers from 292 Brazilian high-school students from a public school to 18 cognitive tests developed to assess different hierarchical levels of the intelligence structure. Most of the participants were girls (53.40%) and their age ranged from 14 to 20 years old (Mean = 15.71, Standard Deviation = 1.15). The BAFACALO's tests were constructed by Gomes (2005, 2010) based on the Educational Testing Service's Kit of Factor-Referenced Cognitive Tests (Ekstrom, French, Harman & Dirmen, 1976).
